contentrichtext.text: '''Heaven Can Wait''' may refer to: * [[Heaven Can Wait (1943 film)|''Heaven Can Wait'' (1943 film)]], a comedy based on the stage play ''Birthday'' by Leslie Bush-Fekete * [[Heaven Can Wait (1978 film)|''Heaven Can Wait'' (1978 film)]], an [[American football]] comedy starring Warren Beatty; a remake of the 1941 film ''[[Here Comes Mr. Jordan]]'' * [[Heaven Can Wait (play)|''Heaven Can Wait'' (play)]], a stage play by [[Harry Segall]]; basis for ''Here Comes Mr. Jordan'' ;In music * [[Heaven Can Wait (EP)|''Heaven Can Wait'' (EP)]], an EP by Gamma Ray * ''[[Heaven Can Wait â€“ The Best Ballads of Meat Loaf Vol. 1]]'', an album * [[Heaven Can Wait (Charlotte Gainsbourg song)|"Heaven Can Wait" (Charlotte Gainsbourg song)]] * [[Heaven Can Wait (Sandra song)|"Heaven Can Wait" (Sandra song)]] * "[[Heaven Can Wait (Michael Jackson song)|Heaven Can Wait]]", a song by Michael Jackson from ''[[Invincible (Michael Jackson album)|Invincible]]'' * "Heaven Can Wait", a song written by [[Jimmy Van Heusen]] and Eddie DeLange * "Heaven Can Wait", a song by [[GPS (band)|GPS]] * "Heaven Can Wait", a song by Grave Digger from ''[[War Games (Grave Digger album)|War Games]]'' * "Heaven Can Wait", a song by Iron Maiden from ''[[Somewhere in Time (Iron Maiden album)|Somewhere in Time]]'' * "Heaven Can Wait", a song by Meat Loaf from ''[[Bat Out of Hell]]'' * "Heaven Can Wait", a song by We The Kings from ''[[Smile Kid]]'' {{disambig}}
